content: working the leg pattern attention the 2 stitches between the red lines are worked for the larger size only repeat each chart line 3 times to complete one round on your needles work rounds 1-4 of leg pattern 13 15 times all together or until the leg is as long as you d like leg chart heel flap now work 5 6 sts as follows k4 sl yf p2 then put the next 37 43 sts on hold they will be worked later for instep turn your work for smaller size only work the next 2 row as follows ws k sl2 yf p2tog k p2tog sl2 yf k2tog k twice sl2 yf p2tog k p2tog sl2 yf k turn rs sl yf k2 p3 k2 p2 twice k2 p3 k2 p turn the heel is worked back and forth over the 27 sts you have still on the needles ws sl yb sl2 yf k3 sl2 yf k2 twice sl2 yf k3 sl2 yf k turn rs sl yf k2 p3 k2 p2 twice k2 p3 k2 p turn work theses last 2 row 14 times i e 28 row total ©caoua coffee 2013 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved d artagnan v 1 page 2/4 d artagnan socks - by caoua coffee for larger size only work the next 2 row as follows ws sl yb k sl2 yf p2tog k p2tog sl2 yf k2 kfb k2 twice sl2 yf p2tog k p2tog sl2 yf k sl yf turn rs p2 k2 p2tog p k2 p2 k2 twice p2 k2 p2tog p k2 p2 turn the heel is worked back and forth over the 34 sts you have still on the needles ws sl yb k sl2 yf k2 8 times turn rs sl yf p k2 p2 8 times turn work theses last 2 row 18 times i e 36 row total continue for both sizes turn heel ws sl yf p15 18 p2tog p1 turn rs sl yb k6 5 ssk k1 turn ws sl yf purl to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn rs sl yb knit to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn repeat theses last 2 row until all sts have been worked now 17 20 heel sts remain gusset setup pick up and knit 16 19 sts along side of heel flap pick up one more st between flap and instep and knit this one continue by knitting all the 37 43 held instep sts as charted in first row of instep chart then pick up 1 st between instep and heel flap and knit it pick up 16 19 more sts along side of heel flap and knit them knit the 34 40 other sole sts this is the new beginning of the round now you have 51 60 sole sts and 37 43 instep sts instep chart gusset decrease round 1 work instep in pattern as established ssk knit to 2 sts before end
